rewards.title: Rewards Overview
rewards.body:
# Rewards Overview

BLOCKWORLD’s rewards are composed of: **gameplay airdrops, boxes, pools, and sponsor campaigns**.

## 1) 5-combo airdrop (BlockRush)

When you trigger a **5-combo** in match-3:

- Airdrop amount: **5–100 BWT (random)**
- No fixed guarantee per run

## 2) Mystery Box

- Randomly appears during gameplay.
- May contain **BWT / USDT / NFTs / sponsor tokens / event rewards** (campaign-dependent).
- The Mystery Box is designed to create a strong “dopamine moment” for first-time users.

## 3) Treasure Box

- Every **BWT revive** grants **one Treasure Box entry**.
- Treasure draws happen every **2 hours** (see Treasure Box page).

## 4) Leaderboard Pool

- Part of Endless ticket revenue is routed into the leaderboard prize pool.
- Distribution depends on the current leaderboard rules (see Leaderboard page).

## Where do rewards come from?

Typically from a combination of:

- user-spend pools (Treasure Pool, Leaderboard Pool),
- sponsor budgets (projects, exchanges, brands),
- platform campaign budgets.

> Reminder: rewards are promotional and subject to risk controls, eligibility checks, and regional restrictions. Key flows are verifiable via the Transparency Dashboard.

items.title: Item Packs
items.body:
# Item Packs

Item packs enhance gameplay in both Story and Endless modes.

## Where can I use items?

- Story Mode: allowed
- Endless Mode: allowed

## Usage caps

- Story Mode: typically unlimited (as shown in-app)
- Endless Mode: each item type up to **5 uses per run**

## Item pack revenue split

- **50%** -> **Burn**
- **40%** -> **Treasury**
- **10%** -> **Referral**

referral.title: Referral 10%
referral.body:
# Referral 10%

Referral is one of our core growth loops. We keep it simple: **one level only**.

## Rate

- **10% one-level referral**

## What spend is covered?

v1.0 typically covers:

- revives,
- Endless tickets,
- item pack purchases,

subject to campaign rules.

## Settlement

- Referrals appear in your dashboard as daily and cumulative amounts.
- On-chain payout visibility will be shown when enabled.

## Anti-fraud

Abnormal behavior (bots, self-referrals, account clusters) may lead to:

- delayed settlement,
- cancellation of referral rewards.

See [Safety & Fairness](./safety.md).

transparency.title: Transparency Dashboard
transparency.body:
# Transparency Dashboard

Transparency is the trust layer of BLOCKWORLD:  
players verify fairness, sponsors verify delivery, investors verify diligence.

## What you can see

Typical modules (as shown on the website/app):

- Burned Today
- Treasure Pool
- Referral Paid Today
- Treasury

Plus:

- Live Token Flow (User Spend -> Pool/Burn/Referral/Treasury)
- Recent Transactions (Tx Feed)

## v1.0 split recap

- Revive (10 BWT): 50% Pool / 30% Burn / 10% Referral / 10% Treasury  
- Endless Ticket (20 BWT): 50% Pool / 30% Burn / 10% Referral / 10% Treasury  
- Item Packs: 50% Burn / 10% Referral / 40% Treasury  

If anything differs on the site, the latest in-app rules prevail.

safety.title: Safety & Fairness
safety.body:
# Safety & Fairness

To ensure real players are rewarded, we continuously fight bots and farming.

## Proof-of-Human

We may use a combination of:

- behavioral signals and input patterns,
- Verified Run (log replay),
- device/account risk signals.

## What can trigger risk controls?

- mass signups or device switching,
- unusually high-frequency claims or spending,
- obvious scripted behavior,
- referral abuse.

## Settlement strategy

We may apply:

- delayed settlement for review,
- linear vesting for large rewards,
- disqualification or clawback for confirmed abuse.

## Appeals

If you believe you were incorrectly flagged, submit an appeal via the official support channel (TBD).

faq.title: FAQ
faq.body:
# FAQ

## Can I withdraw?
Whether withdrawals are enabled, thresholds, and fees depend on the current product version and region. When enabled, you’ll see your withdrawable balance and on-chain records in your dashboard.

## Do I need a wallet?
No. You can start with Google/email. If you withdraw or join deeper on-chain campaigns, the product will guide you.

## Where do rewards come from?
A combination of user-spend pools, sponsor budgets, and platform campaign budgets, with key flows intended to be verifiable on-chain.

## Why didn’t I get a Mystery Box?
Mystery Boxes are random and campaign-dependent. Check “Today’s Drops” or campaign announcements.

## How is referral calculated?
10% one-level on eligible spend (revive/ticket/items). Risk controls can delay or cancel referral payouts.

## How do Treasure draws work?
Every 2 hours: 50% to a random Lucky 100, 50% shared among remaining holders.

## How can I verify the splits?
Use the Transparency Dashboard and Tx feed, and check the corresponding on-chain transactions.

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.body:
# Quick Start

Goal: **you don’t need to understand Web3 to start**.  
Experience the “aha moment” first, learn wallets and on-chain verification later.

## Step 1: One-click login

- Sign in with **Google / Email** (as shown on the site/app).
- We automatically create your **BW-ID account** to track rewards, referral relationships, and security checks.

## Step 2: Play 60 seconds (BlockRush)

- Our first game is **BlockRush (match-3)**.
- Each run lasts ~60 seconds.
- When you trigger a **5-combo**, you receive a random airdrop of **5–100 BWT**.

## Step 3: Open boxes

You may encounter two different “boxes”:

1) **Mystery Box**  
- Randomly appears during gameplay.  
- May contain **BWT / USDT / NFTs / sponsor tokens / event rewards** (campaign-dependent).

2) **Treasure Box**  
- Every time you **revive using BWT**, you receive **one Treasure Box entry**.  
- Treasure draws happen every **2 hours** (see Treasure Box page).

## Next steps (to increase consistency)

- Get your referral link on the [Referral](./referral.md) page (10% one-level).
- Learn how to verify pools/burn/treasury via the [Transparency](./transparency.md) dashboard.
- Want competition? Read [Leaderboard & Tickets](./leaderboard.md).

treasure.title: Treasure Box (2-hour draws)
treasure.body:
# Treasure Box (2-hour draws)

Treasure Box is our core “emotion layer”: it turns revives from pure spend into a participation right — with fully transparent token flow.

## How do I get a Treasure Box?

- Every time you **revive using BWT**, you receive **1 Treasure Box entry**.

## Revive split (10 BWT)

For each **10 BWT** revive:

- **50%** -> **Treasure Pool**
- **30%** -> **Burn** (black hole address)
- **10%** -> **Referral** (one-level)
- **10%** -> **Treasury**

All splits are intended to be visible on-chain and visualized on the Transparency Dashboard.

## Draw schedule

- **One draw every 2 hours**.

## Distribution per round

Let the pool for the round be `P` (BWT):

1) **Lucky 100**  
- **50% (0.5P)** is distributed to **100 randomly selected** players.

2) **Holder Share**  
- The remaining **50% (0.5P)** is split equally among all other Treasure Box holders in that round.

## Risk controls and settlement

For fairness and security:

- suspicious accounts may be delayed or disqualified,
- large rewards may be subject to delayed settlement or linear vesting (as defined in Official Rules).

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard & Endless Tickets
leaderboard.body:
# Leaderboard & Endless Tickets

Endless Mode is designed for competition. Ticket spend contributes to the leaderboard prize pool and is verifiable on-chain.

## Ticket rules

- First Endless entry is **free daily**.
- Additional entries cost **20 BWT** per ticket.

## Limits (per run)

- Up to **5 revives**
- Each item type up to **5 uses**

## Ticket split (20 BWT)

- **50%** -> **Leaderboard Pool**
- **30%** -> **Burn**
- **10%** -> **Referral**
- **10%** -> **Treasury**

## Prize distribution

Exact payout rules (Top N, tiers, ratios) depend on the current leaderboard configuration shown on the leaderboard page.

> Reminder: leaderboard rewards are subject to eligibility and risk controls.

welcome.title: BLOCKWORLD Help Center
welcome.body:
# BLOCKWORLD Help Center

Welcome to BLOCKWORLD. This is the single source for getting started, understanding rewards, verifying on-chain flows, and reading our safety & fairness rules.

## What you’ll find here

- **Quick Start**: start playing in 60 seconds.
- **Modes**: Story Mode / Endless Mode / Leaderboard.
- **Rewards & Drops**: BWT, Mystery Boxes, event drops, Treasure Boxes.
- **Referral**: 10% one-level referral rewards.
- **Transparency Dashboard**: on-chain, verifiable BWT flows.
- **Withdrawals & Account Safety**: process and security notes (placeholder).
- **Safety & Fairness**: Proof-of-Human, anti-bot, delayed settlement.
- **Official Rules**: compliance and AMOE placeholder.

## Quick Links

- [Quick Start](./quick-start.md)
- [Game Modes](./game-modes.md)
- [Rewards Overview](./rewards.md)
- [About BWT](./bwt.md)
- [Treasure Box (2-hour draws)](./treasure-box.md)
- [Referral 10%](./referral.md)
- [Leaderboard & Endless Tickets](./leaderboard.md)
- [Item Packs](./items.md)
- [Transparency & Tx Feed](./transparency.md)
- [Withdrawals (placeholder)](./withdrawals.md)
- [Safety & Fairness](./safety.md)
- [FAQ](./faq.md)
- [Official Rules (placeholder)](./official-rules.md)

## Key Terms

- **BWT**: the BLOCKWORLD Token used for in-game sinks (revives, tickets, item packs) and reward settlement.
- **Mystery Box**: an in-game random box that may contain BWT, sponsor rewards, or event drops.
- **Treasure Box**: an entry you receive when you revive using BWT. Draws happen every 2 hours.
- **Transparency Dashboard**: a real-time / near-real-time view of on-chain flows (pools, burn, referral, treasury) plus a Tx feed you can verify.

> Important: This Help Center explains gameplay and promotional rules. It is not financial advice and not a promise of profit. The latest in-app rules always prevail.

withdraw.title: Withdrawals & Account Safety
withdraw.body:
# Withdrawals & Account Safety

> Note: withdrawal thresholds and requirements may change depending on regional compliance and risk controls. The latest in-app display prevails.

## Where is the withdraw button?

My Dashboard -> **Withdraw**

## What steps might be required?

- basic account verification (TBD),
- Proof-of-Human or risk review for suspicious accounts,
- confirming a receiving address.

## Why can withdrawals be delayed?

- chain congestion,
- risk review,
- campaign settlement window not finished.

## Security tips

- never share verification codes, private keys, or seed phrases,
- beware of phishing links and fake support,
- only use official website/app entry points.

modes.title: Game Modes
modes.body:
# Game Modes

BLOCKWORLD currently offers **Story Mode** and **Endless Mode**. They share the same token economy but have different limits.

## Story Mode

Designed for learning and casual progression.

- **Revive**: when time runs out, you may pay **10 BWT** to revive and gain **+30 seconds**.
- **Item packs**: usable in Story Mode.
- **Item usage**: typically **unlimited** in Story Mode (as shown in-app).
- **Risk controls**: for fairness, the system may enforce reasonable per-run limits or trigger review for abnormal behavior.

## Endless Mode

Designed for competition and leaderboard play.

- **First run free daily**.
- Additional runs on the same day require a **20 BWT ticket**.
- **Revive limit**: up to **5 revives** per run.
- **Item limit**: each item type up to **5 uses** per run.

## Why casual games first?

We intentionally start with low-barrier casual gameplay to:

- bring in **Web2-scale** players,
- avoid forcing wallets / chain concepts upfront,
- create trust through **rewards + transparency + fairness** within 60 seconds,
- then complete education through withdrawal flows and on-chain verification.

## Content roadmap

We plan to **launch 1 game and tease 1 next game** (e.g., BlockRush now, a shooter game next) to reduce single-game lifecycle risk and accumulate core assets at the platform layer.

officialRules.title: Official Rules (Placeholder)
officialRules.body:
# Official Rules (Placeholder)

> Important: This is a structure placeholder for diligence and site completeness. A legal review is required before public launch.

## 1. Definitions

- “BWT” is the BLOCKWORLD Token.
- “Mystery Box” is an in-game random reward box.
- “Treasure Box” is an entry granted by a BWT revive.
- “Treasure Pool / Leaderboard Pool” are the corresponding pools.

## 2. Eligibility

- age requirement (TBD)
- regional restrictions: VOID WHERE PROHIBITED
- anti-fraud: bots and abusive behavior may be disqualified

## 3. How to Enter

### 3.1 Standard Method
- participation via in-game actions (e.g., revives grant Treasure entries)

### 3.2 AMOE — Alternative Method of Entry (TBD)
- **NO PURCHASE NECESSARY TO ENTER OR WIN.**
- AMOE definition and method (TBD): e.g., a daily Verified Run entry, a free task entry, etc.
- submission window, eligibility, and limits (TBD)

## 4. Prize & Distribution

- Treasure draw frequency: every 2 hours (TBD)
- distribution: 50% Lucky 100 + 50% Holder Share (as shown on the site)
- leaderboard pool distribution (TBD)

## 5. Verification & Fraud

- Proof-of-Human / Verified Run (TBD)
- delayed settlement, disqualification, and clawback

## 6. Taxes & Fees (TBD)

## 7. Disclaimers

- promotional rewards; not financial advice; no guarantee of profit
- token volatility risk
- rules may change with notice

## 8. Contact (TBD)

bwt.title: About BWT
bwt.body:
# About BWT

**BWT = the BLOCKWORLD Token.**  
It is the unified unit for sinks, rewards, burn, referrals, and treasury — designed to be transparent and verifiable.

## What can I use BWT for?

### 1) Revive
- Pay **10 BWT** to revive and gain **+30 seconds** (as shown in-app).
- Revive grants a Treasure Box entry and routes part of the spend into Treasure Pool/burn/referral/treasury.

### 2) Endless Ticket
- First Endless run is free daily.
- Additional entries cost **20 BWT** per ticket.

### 3) Item Packs
- Item packs can be used in both modes.
- In Endless Mode: each item type is capped at **5 uses per run**.
- Item pack revenue is partially burned.

## How do I earn BWT?

Common ways:

- 5-combo airdrops (5–100 BWT)
- Mystery Boxes (campaign drops)
- Treasure draws
- Leaderboard settlement
- quests/tasks (if enabled)

## Why on-chain transparency?

Transparency reduces trust friction:

- players can verify pools and burns,
- sponsors can audit delivery,
- investors can perform diligence.

See [Transparency](./transparency.md).

hero.title: Turn your marketing budget into real player rewards
hero.subtitle: Human‑only · Measurable · On‑chain verifiable.

items.0: New users who complete onboarding and education

placements.title: Placements
placements.note: Inventory and schedule follow the Sponsor Kit.

guarantee.title: Our Guarantee: You Only Pay for Humans
guarantee.body: We use Proof-of-Human to validate verified human engagement. If the invalid rate exceeds the agreed threshold, we provide make‑goods or credits under SLA, with a full review completed within 7 business days.

measurement.title: How we measure
measurement.body: We measure with verified human engagement + key conversion events, with verifiable on‑chain proofs.

hero.title: BLOCKWORLD: The Mass Adoption Protocol for Web3
hero.subtitle: A casual‑game gateway turning billions of Web2 players into Web3 citizens—without friction.

points.0: Web3 growth is expensive and often zero‑sum.
points.1: Casual players are the biggest untapped on‑ramp.
points.2: We convert via play → box → withdraw‑as‑education → on‑chain transparency.

team.title: Founder–Market Fit
team.subtitle: Proof through verified experience and output: we understand games, ads, and on-chain risk control.

0.title: Gaming DNA
0.body: Casual retention and economy design: level pacing, dopamine moments, anti-cheat, and long-term content iteration.

1.title: AdTech DNA
1.body: Ad delivery and measurement: SLA, field dictionary, invalid traffic governance, and optimization loops.

2.title: Crypto Native
2.body: Security and risk control: transparent flows, parameterized governance, anti-arbitrage, and incident handling.

team.note: Team and advisors are detailed in the Investor Kit.

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.body: Launch 1 game (Block Rush) + tease next (shooter); expand game matrix and sponsor network.

items.0: Large reward linear release + optional instant claim (extra burn)
items.1: Proof-of-Human to protect real players and sponsor budgets
items.2: On-chain transparency with verifiable transaction proofs

contact.title: Investor contact
contact.body: Contact via investor email/Telegram (add your channels).

header.title: Rules & Policies
header.subtitle: Official Rules (AMOE), Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, and risk disclosures.

officialRules.title: Official Rules (AMOE)
officialRules.body: NO PURCHASE NECESSARY and related requirements vary by jurisdiction. This page is an entry point; each campaign will publish its own Official Rules with participation details.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.body: Entry point for Terms of Service. Covers account usage, user conduct, limitations of liability, and more.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.body: Entry point for Privacy Policy. Explains data collection, usage, storage, and user rights.

risk.title: Risk Disclosure
risk.body: Tokens, campaign rewards, and network interactions carry risks. Participate only after understanding rules and regional restrictions.

withdraw.title: Withdraw
withdraw.note: Withdrawals are subject to Proof-of-Human verification. Large rewards may be vested.

treasure.title: Treasure Draw (Every 2 Hours)
treasure.subtitle: Get 1 Treasure Box per revive. Next draw in:

steps.title: Start in 3 Steps

steps.s1Body: Sign in with Google or Email. Secure account created automatically.
